{{Actor| | type = Gibs | name = Brown chaos serpent left arm | class = Demon2Chunk2 | game = Hexen }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:DemonChunk|DemonChunk]]→Demon2Chunk2
One of the five chunks of meat thrown around when a [[Classes:Demon2|brown chaos serpent]] is gibbed. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Demon2Chunk2 : [[Classes:DemonChunk|DemonChunk]] { States { Spawn: DMBB A 4 DMBB A 10 [[A_QueueCorpse]] DMBB A 20 Wait Death: DMBB A -1 Stop } }
